instanceVariables.name: carouselIndex
instanceVariables.desc: the index is the number that gets incremented or decremented when using a carousel

instanceVariables.name: carouselIndexLast
instanceVariables.desc: used to record changes in the index

instanceVariables.name: carouselValues
instanceVariables.desc: separate by comma - text to display based on index. if content view is enabled, these should instead be tags that reference template names to create

instanceVariables.name: carouselContentView
instanceVariables.desc: turns this into a content carousel, which displays anything you want, not just text
